name: skin-ebay
description: Skin - CSS modules that represent the brand eBay

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run lasso:docs && npm run build:site && npm run copy:lessToDist && npm run copy:svgToDist
scripts.build:css: npm run lint:less && gulp less && npm run lint:css
scripts.lasso:docs: npm run lasso:ds4 && npm run lasso:ds6 && rimraf .cache docs.html.json build
scripts.lasso:ds4: lasso ./docs/ds4.browser.json --name docs --output-dir docs/static/ds4 --plugins lasso-less lasso-autoprefixer --minify && rimraf docs/static/ds4/docs.css.*
scripts.lasso:ds6: lasso ./docs/ds6.browser.json --name docs --output-dir docs/static/ds6 --plugins lasso-less lasso-autoprefixer --minify && rimraf docs/static/ds6/docs.css.*
